snippet: Detective Chief Inspector April Casburn became the first person to be convicted of a criminal offense in the phone hacking scandal that has enveloped Rupert Murdoch’s newspaper empire in Britain.
abstract: Detective Chief Inspector April Casburn, one of most senior female officers at Scotland Yard, is convicted of misconduct in phone hacking scandal surrounding Rupert Murdoch's newspaper empire, becoming first person to be convicted of criminal offense in case.
lead_paragraph: Detective Chief Inspector April Casburn became the first person to be convicted of a criminal offense in the phone hacking scandal that has enveloped Rupert Murdoch’s newspaper empire in Britain.

headline.seo: Scotland Yard Officer Guilty in Phone Hacking Trial
headline.main: Officer at Scotland Yard Is Guilty in Hacking Trial
headline.print_headline: Officer at Scotland Yard Is Guilty in Hacking Trial
